metadata.title: CVE-2023-51704 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in MediaWiki before 1.35.14, 1.36.x through 1.39.xbefore 1.39.6, and 1.40.x before 1.40.2. Inincludes/logging/RightsLogFormatter.php, group-*-member messages can resultin XSS on Special:log/rights.

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
